title: Tour Cities in an Old Classic Car (Caribbean casas)
text: By Caribbean casas Oct 19, 2015 Cuba is a country that is filled with old classic cars that line up well with the classic colonial architecture found in most major cities. If you are looking to leave the comfort of your rented villa in Cuba and explore the picturesque cities, why not do it like the locals and do so on a topless classic. Tourists can hire a car and drive around the cities themselves, or they can hire a driver as well as sit back to take in all the views of the interesting cities and towns. Remember to bring your camera as you will want to stop over and take a few pictures here and there.Tour Cigar FactoriesCuba's world-renowned export comes in the form of cigars. For those who want to get a picture of these are made and maybe understand why they are the best in the world, it is recommended that you take an organized tour of the Cigar factories in Havana. Locally referred to as Habanos, you can tour them while staying in a Havana holiday rental. Make sure you bring a camera so that you get photographic evidence. You may even be lucky enough to learn how to roll one of these famous Cuban exports in the process. Dance in the StreetPerhaps one of the best ways to really experience Cuban culture is by taking part in one of their most treasured rituals, dancing in the street. Rent a house Cuba close to the Callejon de Hemeland get to enjoy some of the best Cuban music lives on the streets. Do not be afraid to jump right in dancing with the locals as they will help you out with some great dance moves as well. Famous Cuban musicians usually frequent this area performing in the street where locals and tourists alike can join in dancing. Enjoy a MojitoIf you are up for it, make sure you enjoy a real mojito made with the authentic Havana Club Rum. Get out of your Cuba vacation rental and head over to Bar Monserrate for a drink with the locals.
